name: Ninja Castle Escape
description:
Use your creativity and ninja skills to escape from the booby trapped castle.
In each stage you must to solve the "mystery" and reach the exit door.

Ninja Castle Escape starts now!
Please enjoy this action puzzle game where your goal is to lead the ninja to a successful escape.

Activate all of the switches on a stage to open the exit door.
Time is limited and the clock is always ticking.
Reach your goal before the countdown ends!

Also, as you progress through the stages, you will be able to acquire various ninja "ninjutsu" skills including Shuriken and Katon techniques.
Use your ninjutsu skills to solve the mysteries of further stages.

■Escape from the Castle!
Challenge yourself to solve all 50 castle stages
As you progress acquire ninjutsu skills
Your goal is escape!
